name: TEAM HEMP INC.
description: Team Hemp, Inc. is a 501(c)(4) advocating for the U.S. hemp industry's economic impact
sampleDescriptions: (1) H.R. 5371 Opposition: Remove hemp-restricting language in H.R. 5371 threatening $28B industry. Lobby House/Senate Appropriations and Members. (2) Pro-Hemp Standards: Advocate age-21+ verification,
